directions: In a medium saucepan over low heat, whisk together the cheese, flour and cream until melted and sauce-like.  Remove from heat and cool.
Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain, crumble and set aside.
In a medium bowl, whisk together cooled cheese sauce, bacon, mayonnaise and milk until evenly blended.  Serve over fresh salads.
title: Creamy Bacon Cheddar Dressing
